questions: Your friend texts asking if you want to grab dinner this week. How do you respond?
A neighbor waves and asks how your day is going. What do you say?
Your coworker brings in homemade cookies and offers you one. How do you react?
An old friend from college messages saying they'll be in town and want to catch up. What do you reply?
Your sibling calls to chat about their new hobby. What do you talk about?
A colleague asks for your opinion on their presentation before the team meeting. What do you tell them?
Your parent asks what you'd like for your birthday. How do you respond?
A friend invites you to their housewarming party. What do you say?
